text: The Stade Pierre-Mauroy is a football stadium in Villeneuve-d'Ascq, France and is the home stadium of Lille OSC. It has a capacity of 50,186. The stadium was opened on 17 August 2012. It was renamed Grand Stade Lille Métropole until 21 June 2013 and named after the death of the former Prime Minister of France Pierre Mauroy (1928–2013). == Other websites == * Stade Pierre-Mauroy official website Category:2012 establishments in Europe Category:2010s establishments in France Pierre-Mauroy Category:Lille Category:Villeneuve-d'Ascq
title: Stade Pierre-Mauroy
